DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether correct QT ( QTc ) interval change occur electrocardiogram ( ECG ) cetuximab administer study population .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Effect Cetuximab Corrected QT ( QTc ) Interval Changes Patients With Advanced Malignancies From Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Advanced metastatic malignant disease originate solid tumor Adequate recovery previous therapy intervention ; least 21 day since major surgery prior radiation therapy Measurable evaluable disease Exclusion criterion : Women childbearing potential ( WOCBP ) breastfeeding , pregnant , unwilling unable use acceptable contraception study least 12 week last onstudy dose cetuximab Men unwilling use acceptable contraception study engage sexual relation WOCBP Symptomatic brain metastasis History myocardial infarction 6 month less prior study entry , severe congestive heart failure , uncontrolled angina , uncontrolled arrhythmia Clinically relevant abnormality screen electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , prevent accurate measurement QT interval Congenital long QT syndrome History risk factor ventricular tachycardia Torsades de pointes history fainting , unexplained loss consciousness , convulsion Prolonged QTc interval screen ECG ( great 470 msec ) use Fridericia 's correction formula Heart rate slower 50 bpm faster 100 bpm rest screen ECG measurement Implantable pacemaker automatic implantable cardioverter defibrillator Sustained supine systolic blood pressure high 150 mmHg low 90 mmHg diastolic blood pressure low 45 mmHg high 95 mmHg screen Known history arterial thrombotic event within 6 month prior study initiation Known history significant peripheral artery disease Current participation clinical trial another investigational new drug device Receipt investigational new drug device within 21 day prior enrollment study
